testCase.name: WorkerPool Initialization should initialize with specified number of workers
WorkerPool Initialization should default to 4 workers if not specified
WorkerPool Initialization should throw error if already initialized
WorkerPool Task Execution should execute a simple task
WorkerPool Task Execution should execute multiple tasks in parallel
WorkerPool Task Execution should queue tasks when all workers are busy
WorkerPool Error Handling should handle task timeout
WorkerPool Error Handling should reject new tasks when shutting down
WorkerPool Statistics should track task completion statistics
WorkerPool Shutdown should gracefully shutdown all workers
WorkerPool Shutdown should wait for active tasks before shutdown
